title: Ep: 041 - From Artist to Architect w/ Paul Raff
description: Welcome to the premiere of Season 2 of Architecture, Design & Photography. In this episode we sit down with Artist and Architect Paul Raff, Principal of Paul Raff Design Studio located in Toronto, Canada.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
